export default function SingleItemList({ value, addToCart, isLogged, userIdLogged, }) { const formatPrice = (price) => { const numberPrice = parseFloat(price); // Convert to number if it's a string if (isNaN(numberPrice)) { return "N/A"; // Handle cases where the price is not a valid number } return numberPrice.toFixed(2); // Format to 2 decimal places }; function handleDeleteItem(item) {} return ( <>
{value.userCreated === userIdLogged && ( )}

{value.title}

₪ {formatPrice(value.price)}

); }
